General.Name: Top Union Electronics
General.Description: Top Union Electronics Corp. provides electronic manufacturing services in Taiwan and China. The company offers design and development services, including process offerings, process simplifications and development, fixture and tolling designs, and parts-placement optimization; and design for manufacturing and reliability simulation services, such as valor DFM auto-scan systems, automated DFM reviews, PCB design problem detection and suggested corrections, QDC comprehensive analysis, and design guidelines for customer. It also offers design for testing and smart repair, which includes hardware and software design testing, auto testing engineering, design for test reviews, and repair system guides. In addition, the company provides design for procurement services comprising BOM and AVL review, process application review, alternative component suggestions, super buffer stock defined, and procurement specification review; design for assembly services consisting of case assembly, packing and shipping, and generation and review of procurement specifications; and prototype services, such as prototyping for engineering design, pilot run, and short ECO implementation cycle, as well as process engineering and planning services. Further, it offers PCBA manufacturing, testing and reliability testing, materials procurement management, and drop shipping services. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 480, Nioupu East Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan
